pullrequest.title: Prevent crash when attempting to load more than one render engine per process

content.raw:
subt loads now but I think it’s ignoring scene3d plugin parameters specified in the ign launch file.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/3336787315-subt_gui_config.png)
‌

In the image above:

* an extra empty gui plugin seems to get loaded and docked on the right,
* gui camera pose from launch file is possibly not read
* there is an `N/A` label at the bottom of the window

‌

‌
content.html:
subt loads now but I think it’s ignoring scene3d plugin parameters specified in the ign launch file.

‌

In the image above:

  • an extra empty gui plugin seems to get loaded and docked on the right,
  • gui camera pose from launch file is possibly not read
  • there is an N/A label at the bottom of the window

‌

‌
